bibl.title: Letter from Henry R. Viets to Philip Showalter Hench, April 7, 1941

div1.p: Viets offers to submit some of Hench's yellow fever papers to the "Bulletin of the Medical Library Association" for publication.

div1.head: Letter from Henry R. Viets to Philip Showalter Hench, April 7, 1941
div1.opener:
PUBLICATION COMMITTEE
HENRY R. VIETS, M.D.
Chairman
and Editor of the Bulletin
Boston Medical Library
JAMES F. BALLARD
Business Manager
Boston Medical Library
8 The Fenway, Boston
MISS MILDRED JORDAN
Medical School Library
Emory University. Ga.
MISS FRIDA PLIEFKE
Mayo Clinic Library
Rochester, Minn.
NATHAN VAN PATTEN
Lane Medical Library

BULLETIN OF THE
MEDICAL LIBRARY ASSOCIATION
8 THE FENWAY, BOSTON, MASS.
April 7, 1941
Founded 1902
Office of the Editor
Dr. P. S. Hench
Mayo Clinic
Rochester, Minnesota
Dear Dr. Hench:
div1.p:
This will remind you that we have
had some correspondence earlier this year
in regard to some papers of yours on yellow
fever.

I wrote you at that time that I should
like to have them by the 15th of April, and
now find that I can extend this time to May
1.
div1.closer:
Yours very truly, Henry R. Viets, M. D.
Editor HRV:LaR
